scripts.dev:watch-main: NODE_ENV=development nodemon --watch backend --ext ts --exec "npm run build:backend && electron dist/backend/main.js"
scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:renderers
scripts.pack-local: npm run build && CSC_IDENTITY_AUTO_DISCOVERY=false electron-builder --dir --publish=never --config.mac.identity=null && cp -r ./dist-electron/mac-arm64/Context.app /Applications/

assets/icons/production.png --out assets/icons/production.iconset/icon_16x16@2x.png && sips -z 32 32 assets/icons/production.png --out assets/icons/production.iconset/icon_32x32.png && sips -z 64 64 -z 512 512 assets/icons/production.png --out assets/icons/production.iconset/icon_256x256@2x.png && sips -z 512 512 assets/icons/production.png --out assets/icons/production.iconset/icon_512x512.png
